messages.message:
Hi Team,
This is an issue we are facing for P&G AI Hub app. The split classification is not working for the split by documents category.
The split here has to be done on one of the parameters present in the doc - Batch Number.
Tried multiple prompts but nothing seem to work for this use case
https://pg.aihub.instabase.com/build/0198e06b-d161-7fdc-b586-21f2a4d9931c

CC: @Raushan Kumar Pandey @Nithin
The prompts used here are attached. One of the docs we are trying is also attached here.

should each page be a separate doc? if so, you can just use the "Split each page" setting

i didn't see any examples where multiple pages have the same batch no, but maybe i missed something
